title: Expert Customer Service VA | Airbnb and STR Experience REQUIRED
job_overview:
Looking for guest experience specialist for STR company.
Must be great with communications and customer service!

Qualifications:
-Must have 3+ years experience in similar role
-Has Co-hosting experience
-The ideal candidate will have experience with Hostaway PMS and integration with other Online Travel Agencies (OTAs)
-Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.
-High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
-Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Preferred if you know how to use:
-Hostaway
-OTAs
-Slack
-Openphone
-Amazon
-Ring
-Schlage

Plus if you have experience on:
-Review disputes
-Airbnb claims

Looking for long-term employment and exclusivity to work for my company.

Don't send canned responses.
When applying, start with years of experience in STR and applications used. Note the total number of properties managed. Include a description of tasks handled.

Answer this in your application:
1. Why do you think you've been successful in customer service above others that have not?
2. What do you know about the Airbnb culture? Why do you think it is successful?

You won't be considered if you do not answer the above and if you answer using AI. I'm only interested in someone who pays attention to details and can follow instructions.
